data.message: I asked for multi location for my business page, after coonvert when I found its buggy, I mail to support by page dashboard.  The support guy 'Josephine' replied us the steps to restore old reviews and location of my page. But after doing it, I lost my all reviews. Now when I mailed him again, he told he cant do it. So, I asked him if he is failed then he should take help from technical team. Now He keep my case closing each and every time with no reply.  Reviews are very important for us and we worked and used facebook ads to attract people for our page. So, where should I wrote regarding this issue. [Current showing reviews are new, old reviews gone in another page, also old users unable to review us now] Page Link : https://www.facebook.com/DOT4LIFE/
